website_summaries.verdict: Durable and comfortable after the break-in period, these boots are sturdy and come from a trusted name.
pros: Ergonomic soles and wide toe boxes offer ample traction and, for some, better comfort
cons: not waterproof in extremely wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: 5 wide which is a good start. I have already walked in water
customer_reviews.text: I fear buying footwear online because of the hassle of having to return if they don't fit. Amazon's return policy is basically hassle free so I ordered these. They sent me the right size 11.5 wide which is a good start. I have already walked in water, through mud, on greasy floors, gotten them wet-dry, wet-dry again and they have holding up well. Very well made, with great treads on the bottom. Winter is on its way and I believe these boots will move me safely through snow and ice as well as keep my feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: mv101162

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for over 3 years now, and they're still going strong. Granted, they look nothing like the picture. The sole has worn down almost flat, the leather around the ankle has worn away, and I think I'm on my 5th pair of laces at this point, but they are incredibly comfy once broken in. They're just awesome steel toe boots.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: really great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother for Christmas..he works in a factory and all his boots keep falling apart...he has had them for about a week now and says he loves them and they feel great on his feet says their really comfy and keeps thanking me for the boots....wouldn't hesitate about buying a pair for my bf or dad or even my other brother all I can say is REALLY GREAT BUY!!!! Strongly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Solo

customer_reviews.title: Great till they fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots as they look like what I wanted and were a great price... but after 3 months the sole started peeling from the front of the boot and just kept getting worse. I don't drag my feet and I don't work a job that's hard on my footwear. Tried glue but... fail. Made them leak bad too just walking in the rain. Not going with this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: aaron7

customer_reviews.title: Holds up Well
customer_reviews.text: My husband does a lot of manual work and really works these boots hard. These are the first boots that lasted for more than a couple of months. They are still going tough and strong. They dont fall apart like a lot of other cheap boot crap. Highly recommend for anyone who needs a strong boot.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these everyday to work for 5 months. I wear a size 10 and these fit just fine. They took a few days to break in a feel comfortable. Thanks to the lacing hooks, they come on and off very easily. I have no complaints and find it to be comfortable for a steel toe boot and very durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: +mb

customer_reviews.title: Great boot from CAT
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these boots and i have been wearing them for a week. They are comfortable n seem very durable. I work in a metal cutting shop so i put my boots through a lot of abuse but i expect these to last 2 years at least. They are a little heavy but that's ok because the are strictly work boots and i light flimsy boot wouldn't last me like i'm sure these will.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E.

customer_reviews.title: Good boots.
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I got one full size smaller than usual and they fit great. Nice looking and comfortable boots. Update: Very comfortable. They broke in after about 30-40 hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Biggidy

customer_reviews.title: great work boot
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this boot it took a Lil longer than usual to break in around the ankle and fits a Lil too big for the size but other than that is a very good quality for the price my back feels better with this boot for some reason so far so good would actually buy again. But a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Firewild831805

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable out of the box and not much better after wearing them for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A

customer_reviews.title: Rebranded shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes hoping to get better quality but these are the same shoes sold at walmart for double the price, it just has caterpillar instead of braxma on it. Do not buy unless you have money to throw away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Work Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable boots. they take about a week to adjust, for the right feel. In shoes i am a size 10.5 and 11 but i got them one size smaller, so my boots are size 9, and they fit perfect. I suggest getting them one whole size less and wide.
customer_reviews.author: Gambo

customer_reviews.title: steel toe bliss
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from day one (rare for work boots). Exellant ankle support & rigid insole for working off ladders & on roofs. Good traction on wet metal roofs. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Worker

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why these boots are so highly rated. They are the most uncomfortable boots I've ever owned. There's a seam around the steel toe cap that wrecked the tops of my toes, and the sole might as well be made of steel too, because that's what it feels like. I wore them for a week and my feet are destroyed. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Dom F

customer_reviews.title: it was just too painful to walk
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 10.5 but I always buy 11 in runnng shoes and work shoes. I ordered size 11 and it fit well. The problem I had with was the boots rubbed blisters on both of my heels after 1 day of wear. I thought maybe I could break them in but when I put them on the next day, it was just too painful to walk. I wish I could have made them work. They are nice looking and exactly what I wanted. Probably just my foot shape. I didn't see anyone else having this issue. Sent them back and Amazon quickly issued a refund. Maybe I'll try the Timberland Pit Boss instead.
customer_reviews.author: John Spencer

customer_reviews.title: these just don't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: my feet never fit quite right in these, even after breaking them in they were uncomfortable to wear for more than a couple hours at a time(I work 12 hour shifts in a factory so that does not work for me) they did seem to hold up relatively well aside from the loops on the back both of which broke within the first week. overall I will not be a return customer for these as my experience was not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the Width if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. Quality appears good. Watch out for the width, it seems to run a bit narrow. Unfortunately, the 13 W is a bit too narrow for my size 12-1/2 2E width. feet. The size chart shows the W width is 2E and the XW is 3E. The XW boot was not available in the pull down sizes so I had to return the 2e boots and go with the Wolverine size 13 3E boot instead. The Wolverine boots are just wide enough - a 4E would be better but I could not find any. Would have been 4 stars if not for the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ckent323

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these for a very long time but my initial impression is as follows. I love these boots! They seem very durable and the steel toe is super strong. I have bumped my foot on a bricks wall to test it and didn't feel a thing. They are heavy but that is with all steel toe footware. The size is a little( and I mean a little) too big. I'm normally a size 13" but these seemed to be more like a 13.5". I'm still keeping them as a 12" or a 12.5" would be too small for me. All in all I can't wait to get to some yard work/ drill sessions( Fire/EMS) in these:)
customer_reviews.author: j_fritz123

customer_reviews.title: Great casual work boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots for around the house work or cutting firewood. They are quality leather and a rebuildable sole. I do not like that they are made in china but that is my only complaint. Pretty good water resistance until it gets over the ankle deep. For heavy work I do not recommend these boots but for a great everyday boot these are awesome. I wear Whites Smoke Jumpers to work in, they were custom fit and the best boots you can buy, but at almost triple the price ($450-$500) they are expensive. I bought these because my Whites are 10 inches and take a little time to lace up, these you just through on and go!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: awesome work boots. i expect they will last. so far, no issues. i am worried about the laces. seem to be slightly fraying already. anyone know what the lace length is?
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Seam AND sole splits
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before and they held up pretty well through tough conditions.The third pair that I purchased in March 2018 has split as a seam. Extremely disappointed as these were pretty comfortable. Additionally the soles on both boots are starting to split. I work outside and in and air dry these everyday after work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Proud cat boot wearer for 9 years.
customer_reviews.text: This boot has never let me down. I wear these daily in light and heavy construction. As with any boot the leather on the steel toe can wear down to the metal depending on the amount of abuse you give the toe area. This is a great overall boot. There may be cheaper and lesser quality or higher price and better quality but for this price and this level of quality you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Best boots at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I have had my boots for 4 years now and put hundreds if not thousand of walking miles on them. Soles still going strong and they look super nice with a military spit shine. Although I do not have this exact pair of boots. I know and trust Caterpillar for my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Custo

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them a few days cutting trees, but these boots feel very sturdy and tough. They're just getting to the point where they're broken in and quite comfortable. They run very big though. I wear a 9.5 sneaker, but my feet were swimming in these. I sent them back for a 8.5 that fits just right, with a regular thin cotton sock. I'd definitely recommend them, just be aware of the sizing. Maybe boots in general run large and these are on par? I don't know, I just know the fit was 1 size smaller than my New Balance sneaker...
customer_reviews.author: ashtong63

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I have bought cheap work shoes at common stores around and they didn't last longer than a Month. I bought these two months ago and used them a lot for work. I do not yet see any wear on them. They are very well constructed and was worth paying a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Annoymous

customer_reviews.title: Spend $30 more and get Timberlands.
customer_reviews.text: I work in rental yard, pressure washing, operating large equipment on my feet all day, these lasted 6 months before the seen along the sole came apart, there also heavy which I thought I wouldn't care about but after buying timberlands that are considerably lighter and are still going after 10 months I'm a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wicks

customer_reviews.title: light on the feet
customer_reviews.text: These work boots are just so comfortable on my feet, even though it looks tight and heavy, it really is light in the feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Work Boots and everyday boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these boots almost everyday even if its just to hang out with some friends. They are very comfortable and fit nicely. I would recommend these to everyone! A couple of my friends were interested too!
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made low grade materials
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem great but they wore out on me in less than 6 months! They are construction grade boots per say and I wore them only working in a kitchen and there is a holel almost all the way through on both boots on the ball of the foot, as well as the inside tearing up and coming out this is ridiculous considering the price. I've bought cheap boots at target that lasted just as long! These are not worth the $ money and have terrible durability!
customer_reviews.author: Dean13

customer_reviews.title: Feet piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I am working a job that requires steel to boots. I have used this boot for a long time. Great protection
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

product_meta.title: Caterpillar Men's 2nd Shift 6" Steel Toe Boot
product_meta.description:
This classically styled 2nd Shift boot from Caterpillar is a boot that was made to last. This hardworking boot has a full grain leather upper with a Goodyear welt construction, a Climasphere sockliner, and a slip-resistant rubber outsole for strong footing at all times.

As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
feature_bullets: Ankle-cut work boot with steel toe with padded ankle and oil-resistant outsole
